casebody.data:
NC BOARD OF PHARMACY
v.
COMMISSION. No. 673A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 26, 2006. Carson Carmichael, III, M. Denise Stanford, Anna Baird Choi, Pual K. Sun, Jr., Julia F. Youngman, Raleigh, for NC Board of Pharmacy. William W. Plyler, Stephen T. Smith, Raleigh, Christopher G. Browning, Jr., Solicitor-General, for Rules of Review Commission, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of April 2006 by Plaintiff for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiff (NC Board of Pharmacy) shall have up to and including the 22nd day of May 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of April 2006."
